summary: An Emirati couple return home from a trip and discover that their new apartment has been built on a site that is home to some malevolent beings.
cast: Razane Jammal|Khalid Laith|Aiysha Hart|Abdullah Al Junaibi|Carol Abboud|May Calamawy|Militzia Radmilovic|Kristina Coker|Ahd|Paul Luebke|Saoud Al Kaabi|Ahmed Abdullah|Malik McCall|Ghaleb El Saadi|Marwan Al Kaabi|Abeer Mere|Rajeev Daswani|Ghassan Al Katheri|Raza Hamid|Nadine Tah Tah|Massek Abdullah|Natachsa Gothi|Roula Atiyat|Mohannad Huthail|Soumaya Akaaboune|Maktoum Ahmed|Abdullah Al Braiki|Kalthum El Naas|Sophia Jawad|Abeer Mohammed|Rafak Atiyat|Lemar Rustum|Valentina Lacle|Mohamed Yasser|Yousef Al Rifa
title: Djinn
